document_data.name: Brialer Erkowe
document_data.mainbody: '''Brialer Erkowe''' was a former [[adventurer]] who found a new life as an innkeeper in the city of [[Myth Drannor]]. He was the owner and proprietor of the [[Owl Towers]] inn, found in the Myth Drannan district of [[Dlabraddath]].
document_data.Abilities:
Brialer was trained as an [[elven dualist]] and held the title of [[alurakar]]. As such his training offered him great skill with the [[Faer√ªn]]ian schools of magic, [[abjuration]] and [[alteration]]. 12

He was still an adept caster after his injury, though it took him longer to cast his spells.
document_data.History: He traveled as an adventurer for some time until his final endeavor brought that life to a sudden end. Brialer lost his left hand during his final venture, though the exact story of the wound was unknown.
